column2: Shoot a spine at your target.

<c=@reminder>This is only available from the Black Lion Trading Company during limited-time sales.</c>

If you wear the White Feather Wings Backpack, speak to a scout in Verdant Brink to receive a free matching glider.
Leap at your target, immobilizing them briefly.
<c=@abilitytype>Glyph.</c> Tether yourself to nearby foes. Whenever you take damage, deal damage to the foes tethered to you.
Return a raven egg to a nest in Wayfarer Foothills.
Dropped by Sons of Svanir enemies.
Mossheart Walk: Within a small cave opposite wyvern's pylon.
Bring the Skritt King a shiny orb harvested from the large glowing orb at the Wreck of the Golden Vanity in Cursed Shore.
Complete the story step Buried Insight.""
Increase outgoing healing to other allies whenever you heal an ally besides yourself.
Find a rare cactus flower while harvesting cactus in the Maguuma Wastes and bring it to Ikkhit'ch's friend, the Seraph Archer in Camp Resolve.
Experience the trickery of the Chaos Crystal Cavern in Iron Marches.
Time until the list of available mission opportunities will be refreshed.
The vines blocking the Northgate of Tarir have been destroyed.
Balthazar's Rest: On a rock with a clear view of the temple door.
Swipe at your target, inflicting cripple.
You can place an exit portal.
Dropped by the Mark II Inquest golem in Mount Maelstrom.
Imbue an Orichalcum Horn at the Serenity Temple in Blazeridge Steppes.
Dropped by Cave Trolls found in caves around Central Tyria.
Bonus Mist Champion—Grymm Svaard Miniature Reward Track
Tarnished Treetop: Look on the southern-canopy tree branches for this mask.
When you heal an ally, you are also healed.
Westwatch outpost has been powered up.
Used in the crafting of weapons with +Power, +Toughness, +Ferocity, and +Healing.
Destroy the Elemental Source in the Snowblind Fractal.
Found in the Spekk's Lab chest in Caledon Forest.
The Falls: Somewhere behind the expansive wall of water.
This particular variety is only grown by the Mossman of the Swampland Fractal.
Double-click to complete one random Hero Challenge from the Maguuma region.
<c=@abilitytype>Glyph.</c> Channel the power of the stars to prevent harm to your allies.
Gather a sample of the materials the Dredge used to construct their buildings from the De Molish Post armory in Dredgehaunt Cliffs.
Lunge at your target and cover them with immobilizing goop.
A recipe to make ascended light boots with Marauder (+Power, +Precision, +Vitality, and +Ferocity) stats.
The cannons are running on reserve power.
May be found in grand Exalted chests.
Sold by Lakor Grizzlemouth in Butcher's Block.
Fang of the vinetooth, found in Auric Basin.
Using the Wolf Totem to channel the wolf's hunting spirit, track down and kill a wild bull.
A recipe to make ascended medium boots with Marauder (+Power, +Precision, +Vitality, and +Ferocity) stats.
The Falls: Check every southern-side tree branch leading down to the falls.

This box contains the Mist Champion Nika, dragonite ore, empyreal fragments, obsidian shards, and mystic clovers. Completing this track gives access to the Bonus Mist Champion—Nika Miniature Reward Track.""
Rescue a chicken from the Chickenado in Dry Top.
Fight your way back into Tarir!
Barriers you receive are stronger. Reduce incoming condition damage while you have barrier.
Bring an Anthology of Villains to the defeat of Champion Frainn in the Great Oouo of Timberline Falls.
Double-click to unlock a recipe for a Wolf Totem.
The spikenose beetle charges its foes when enraged.
Used to make the scribe's sketchbook for Uzolan's Mechanical Orchestra.
Found in Crystallized Supply Caches in Tangled Depths.
Throw a Jar of Harpy Pheromones at the Molten Firestorm in the Molten Boss Fractal.
A recipe to make an ascended trident with Crusader (+Power, +Toughness, +Ferocity, and +Healing) stats.
Pact Encampment Tier 1 completed! Help the ship's officers reinforce the camp to access Tier 2.

Vote for Champion's Dusk today in PvP's Unranked Arena and help test the new Stronghold PvP mode.

Learn more here.
Imbue an Orichalcum Horn at the Strange Energy Source in Timberline Falls.

Ley-Line Crystal Collector
• Trades Goods for Ley-Line Crystals
Pact Encampment: Tier 2 unlocked! The second adventure is available.
Deal increased damage to crippled foes. Justice's passive effect cripples enemies.
%str1% is far too dangerous a place to enter alone. Speak with the explorers in the Guild Initiative Headquarters in Lion's Arch about claiming this location for your guild.
Earn 25,000 world experience in the Borderlands or Eternal Battlegrounds maps within the time limit.
Bring an Anthology of Villains to the defeat of Draithor the Drill in the Blackroot Cut of Kessex Hills.
A Southwatch pylon has been activated.
The dragon will blast everyone clear of its domain in 10 minutes!
A recipe to make an ascended axe with Crusader (+Power, +Toughness, +Ferocity, and +Healing) stats.
<c=@abilitytype>Glamour.</c> Create a field of energy that rips boons from foes and cures conditions on allies.
Open-world mission in which participants are transformed and required to pass through a series of markers before reaching a finish line, all within a time limit.
A recipe to make ascended heavy shoulders with Marauder (+Power, +Precision, +Vitality, and +Ferocity) stats.
Found in Airship Cargo in Verdant Brink.
Read about the quaggan love potion in the Durmand Priory.
Gather a sample of the materials the Molten Alliance used in constructing their base from the Molten Boss Fractal chest.
A recipe to make an ascended spear with Crusader (+Power, +Toughness, +Ferocity, and +Healing) stats.
Used to craft ascended and legendary backpacks. Made from Essences of Luck, Thermocatalytic Reagents, and a Cube of Stabilized Dark Energy.
A recipe to make an ascended insignia for crafting armor with Marauder (+Power, +Precision, +Vitality, and +Ferocity) stats.
Used in the crafting of armor with +Power, +Precision, +Vitality, and +Ferocity.
A recipe to make an ascended spear with Marauder (+Power, +Precision, +Vitality, and +Ferocity) stats.
Unable to use tactic. Only available to allied players.
This item can only be crafted once per character.
Morwood Wilds: In the sky overlooking one of the blighted saplings.
Fire a rocket from each hand.
Using the Wolf Totem to channel the wolf's hunting spirit, track down and kill an eagle.
Bristleback Chasm: Across the falls, stuck on a tree.
A recipe to make ascended light gloves with Marauder (+Power, +Precision, +Vitality, and +Ferocity) stats.
A recipe to make an ascended rifle with Crusader (+Power, +Toughness, +Ferocity, and +Healing) stats.
A recipe to make an ascended mace with Crusader (+Power, +Toughness, +Ferocity, and +Healing) stats.

<c=@abilitytype>Shout.</c> Shout and infuse your allies with arcane energy. Allies who would take lethal damage while this is active ignore the deathblow and are healed instead. If the effect expires naturally, grant an aura based on your current attunement.
A recipe to make an ascended harpoon gun with Marauder (+Power, +Precision, +Vitality, and +Ferocity) stats.
Complete the Out of Cluck achievement: While inside the Urban Battleground Fractal, kill all of the chickens in the city.
Sold by Gentt the bug collector in Dry Top.
A recipe to make an ascended light coat with Crusader (+Power, +Toughness, +Ferocity, and +Healing) stats.
Defeat the Mark II golem in Mount Maelstrom.
Too many troops have been lost. Fall back.

This will replace the appearance of any back item and unlock the backpack skin and the glider in your account wardrobe.

This backpack skin has no stats of its own.
Can be found on members of the Inquest throughout Tyria.
Contains first-tier crafting materials. Double-click to open.
It will begin firing at our enemy's outer gates shortly.
Congratulations! You've crafted the backpack Unbound.

Double-click to feed 250 Piles of bloodstone dust in exchange for a gift. Applies 1 stack of Aurillium Plating if used in the Auric Basin. Herta can only absorb a limited amount of bloodstone dust in a day.

The recovered head of this Exalted continues to glow, presumably with consciousness.
Purchase the recipe for this from Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs.
